system.description: Specialized training for assassins, focusing on precision and lethal strikes.

levelDescriptions.1: 1 attack per melee round and +2 to strike.
levelDescriptions.3: +3 to roll with punch/fall/impact and +3 to pull punch.
levelDescriptions.6: +3 to parry and dodge, and body flip/throw.
levelDescriptions.7: Knockout/stun on an unmodified roll of 17-20.
levelDescriptions.9: Kick attacks: Karate style kick (does 2D4 damage) and any two of choice, except jump kicks.
levelDescriptions.10: Critical strike on an unmodified roll of 19 or 20.
levelDescriptions.12: Death Blow on a roll of a natural 20 (if desired).
